description: Introducing the new and improved version of their iconic Ayaba coat, the Ayaba MIX. This model takes style, comfort, and versatility to the next level. They've incorporated a lighter fabric for the bottom and sleeves, while maintaining the ultra-protective fabric for the upper body that has made the coat so renowned. With its down and feather insulation, the Ayaba Mix provides exceptional warmth in freezing temperatures, down to -30°C. The waterproof two-tone nylon shell combines breathability with wind-blocking properties, creating a reliable shield against icy gusts. Inner cuffs ensure your hands stay warm, and the adjustable hood and two-way zipper offer customized comfort and flexibility. The Ayaba Mix is more than just a parka. It's your ultimate defense against the winter cold.
name: Ayaba Mix II Jacket - Womens

specs.value: White duck down, 80% down 20% feather - fill power of 700 in³
